Returns a success response (200) confirming deletion. Side effects: user account is immediately removed, all associated data may be archived or deleted per retention policy, and the user can no longer authenticate.
data.reasoning: Summary is adequate but description lacks output details and side effects. Added clarity about what happens after deletion, the permanent nature of the operation, and implications for the deleted user to help AI agents understand the destructive nature and restrictions of this operation.
